name: Shinobido: Tales of the Ninja
description:
Gamuran has been defeated. By laying this elite warrior to rest, the Asuka Ninja have prevented war in Utakata. However, the threat of conflict is far from over.

As the population of Utakata work night and day to rebuild their hometown, something in the shadows watches, ready to bring a new wave of terror to the fallen province...

  • Team up for co-op missions or take on your friends in Wireless battles via Ad Hoc Mode.
  • Over 70 new missions, made exclusively for Shinobido: Tales of the Ninja
  • Transfer missions to from Shinobido: Tales of the Ninja from Shinobido: Way of the Ninja on PlayStation2
